landing.heroTitle: Optimize Fertilizer Usage for Higher Yield
landing.heroSubtitle: Our sustainable fertilizer optimizer helps you maximize crop yield while reducing environmental impact.
landing.aboutDescription: We provide an intelligent system that recommends the optimal amount of fertilizer based on crop type, soil conditions, and environmental factors. Our solution is eco-friendly, ensuring the best balance between productivity and sustainability.

feature1.title: Smart Recommendations
feature1.description: Get precise fertilizer recommendations for each crop.

feature2.title: Eco-friendly
feature2.description: Minimize environmental impact while improving yield.

feature3.title: Real-time Analysis
feature3.description: Analyze soil data and conditions in real-time for optimal fertilization.

landing.contactDescription: Have any questions? Reach out to us for more information.
landing.footerText: © 2024 Sustainable Fertilizer Optimizer. All Rights Reserved.
